entities.name: people
entities.description: Refers to those who panicked when they saw the Dark Mark in the sky.

entities.name: You-Know-Who
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, also known as Voldemort. Mentioned by Mr. Weasley as having sent the Dark Mark into the air whenever he killed.

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who is confused about the significance of the Dark Mark.

entities.name: Mr. Weasley
entities.description: An adult who explains to Ron and others why the Dark Mark is significant.

entities.name: Bill
entities.description: Another of Harry's friends who comments on how the Dark Mark scared away the Death Eaters.

entities.name: Death Eaters
entities.description: A group of followers of You-Know-Who who were trying to attack but were scared away by the Dark Mark.

entities.name: Robertses
entities.description: Two people whose memories are being modified.

relationships.description: You-Know-Who is the leader of the Death Eaters.
The Dark Mark inspired fear in people when it appeared in the sky.
The Death Eaters attempted to attack the Robertses but were scared away by the Dark Mark.
The Dark Mark scared away the Death Eaters.
